ygData.subject: SAB and company, meet da bombs!...
ygData.msgSnippet: SAB + 1 walk out of the woods, they just walk out into a field, playing nicely since they were drunk. Meeting you guys was the best thing that ever happened

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

SAB + 1 walk out of the woods, they just walk out into a field, playing nic=
ely since they were drunk.

"Meeting you guys was the best thing that ever =
happened to me." Rizopas says. He pours a beer on his head. Blender laughs =
and pours a beer on Rizopas' head. He looks around to make sure nobody is w=
atching them. Stronghold leans up against a tree, making funny sounds and p=
eeling an apple down to nothing with his finger!

Land Mine and Time Bomb l=
eave the base in shame, why did this always happen to them? Whatever, they =
had to find KitKat.

"KitKat left because of us, I know it!" Land Mine said=
. She was crying again. Time Bomb growled and walked on. They both walked t=
hrough the field that SAB were in in their search for KitKat.

"We need to =
apologize to her, she thought we loved pain, but really, we just need it to=
 bring back the memories and because we deserved it." Time Bomb said.

"Rig=
ht on, brother!" Stronghold said. They both look at SAB and Company.

"Brot=
her?" Time Bomb asked.

"I'm not your brother, skank!" Blender yelled.

"Wh=
o is my brother?" Rizopas asked.

"My brother is dead, I kill he!" Strongho=
ld said with a laugh.

"Kill these 2, yes?" Rizopas asked.

"Yeah, lets kil=
l those pansies." Stronghold said. Blender and Stronghold stood up, Rizopas=
 stood up and walked in front of them. Time Bomb and Land Mine both stared =
helplessly.

"Ilike Rizopas alot more than I liked Arrow, so let's let Rizo=
pas live!" Blender suggested to Stronghold.

"Yeah, we just kill the 2 pans=
ies!" Stronghold said, pointing at Time Bomb and Land Mine. Land Mine opens=
 her commlink, she didn't think of this before.

"KitKat? I'd like to say t=
hat me and Time Bomb are sorry, we had to say it now, because we're about t=
o die, don't bother sending help, these 3 guys will have us in a million pi=
eces by the time help arives." Land Mine said, she sent that message to Kit=
Kat and closed her eyes. Time Bomb gulped in fear...
